pkgmetadata.longdescription: Roughened Random Forests for Binary Classification // A set of functions to support Xiong K, 'Roughened Random Forests for Binary Classification' (2014). The functions include RRFA, RRFB, RRFC1-RRFC7, RRFD and RRFE. RRFB and RRFC6 are usually recommended. RRFB is much faster than RRFC6.
